SOCIAL_HX.name: SOCIAL_HX
SOCIAL_HX.description: The SOCIAL_HX table contains social history data for each history encounter stored in your system. This table has one row per history encounter.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CIGARETTES_YN
columns.description: Y if the patient uses cigarettes. N if the patient does not.  NOTE: Uses the EPIC_IN_ITEM function to determine if a given value exists in a multiple response item.  If the category value for this selection exists in the multiple response item, then it returns "Y", otherwise it returns "N".

columns.name: PIPES_YN
columns.description: Y if the patient smokes a pipe. N if the patient does not.  NOTE: Uses the EPIC_IN_ITEM function to determine if a given value exists in a multiple response item.  If the category value for this selection exists in the multiple response item, then it returns "Y", otherwise it returns "N".

columns.name: CIGARS_YN
columns.description: Y if the patient uses cigars. N if the patient does not. NOTE: Uses the EPIC_IN_ITEM function to determine if a given value exists in a multiple response item.  If the category value for this selection exists in the multiple response item, then it returns "Y", otherwise it returns "N".

columns.name: SNUFF_YN
columns.description: Y if the patient uses snuff. N if the patient does not. NOTE: Uses the EPIC_IN_ITEM function to determine if a given value exists in a multiple response item.  If the category value for this selection exists in the multiple response item, then it returns "Y", otherwise it returns "N".

columns.name: CHEW_YN
columns.description: Y if the patient uses chewing tobacco. N if the patient does not. NOTE: Uses the EPIC_IN_ITEM function to determine if a given value exists in a multiple response item.  If the category value for this selection exists in the multiple response item, then it returns "Y", otherwise it returns "N".

columns.name: ALCOHOL_COMMENT
columns.description: Free-text comments regarding the patient�s use of alcohol.

columns.name: IV_DRUG_USER_YN
columns.description: Y if the patient is an IV drug user. N if the patient is not.  NOTE: Uses the EPIC_IN_ITEM function to determine if a given value exists in a multiple response item.  If the category value for this selection exists in the multiple response item, then it returns "Y", otherwise it returns "N".

columns.name: ILLICIT_DRUG_CMT
columns.description: Free-text comments regarding the patient�s use of illicit drugs.

columns.name: FEMALE_PARTNER_YN
columns.description: Y if the patient has a female sexual partner. N if the patient does not. NOTE: Uses the EPIC_IN_ITEM function to determine if a given value exists in a multiple response item.  If the category value for this selection exists in the multiple response item, then it returns "Y", otherwise it returns "N".

columns.name: MALE_PARTNER_YN
columns.description: Y if the patient has a male sexual partner. N if the patient does not. NOTE: Uses the EPIC_IN_ITEM function to determine if a given value exists in a multiple response item.  If the category value for this selection exists in the multiple response item, then it returns "Y", otherwise it returns "N".

columns.name: CONDOM_YN
columns.description: Y if the patient uses a condom during sexual activity. N if the patient does not. NOTE: Uses the EPIC_IN_ITEM function to determine if a given value exists in a multiple response item.  If the category value for this selection exists in the multiple response item, then it returns "Y", otherwise it returns "N".

columns.name: PILL_YN
columns.description: Y if the patient uses birth control pills. N if the patient does not. NOTE: Uses the EPIC_IN_ITEM function to determine if a given value exists in a multiple response item.  If the category value for this selection exists in the multiple response item, then it returns "Y", otherwise it returns "N".

columns.name: DIAPHRAGM_YN
columns.description: Y if the patient uses a diaphragm. N if the patient does not. NOTE: Uses the EPIC_IN_ITEM function to determine if a given value exists in a multiple response item.  If the category value for this selection exists in the multiple response item, then it returns "Y", otherwise it returns "N".

columns.name: IUD_YN
columns.description: Y if the patient uses an IUD. N if the patient does not. NOTE: Uses the EPIC_IN_ITEM function to determine if a given value exists in a multiple response item.  If the category value for this selection exists in the multiple response item, then it returns "Y", otherwise it returns "N".

columns.name: SURGICAL_YN
columns.description: Y if the patient uses a surgical method of birth control such as hysterectomy, vasectomy, or tubal-ligation. N if the patient does not. NOTE: Uses the EPIC_IN_ITEM function to determine if a given value exists in a multiple response item.  If the category value for this selection exists in the multiple response item, then it returns "Y", otherwise it returns "N".

columns.name: SPERMICIDE_YN
columns.description: Y if the patient uses spermicide. N if the patient does not. NOTE: Uses the EPIC_IN_ITEM function to determine if a given value exists in a multiple response item.  If the category value for this selection exists in the multiple response item, then it returns "Y", otherwise it returns "N".

columns.name: IMPLANT_YN
columns.description: Y if the patient uses an implant as a form of birth control. N if the patient does not. NOTE: Uses the EPIC_IN_ITEM function to determine if a given value exists in a multiple response item.  If the category value for this selection exists in the multiple response item, then it returns "Y", otherwise it returns "N".

columns.name: RHYTHM_YN
columns.description: Y if the patient uses the rhythm method as a form of birth control. N if the patient does not. NOTE: Uses the EPIC_IN_ITEM function to determine if a given value exists in a multiple response item.  If the category value for this selection exists in the multiple response item, then it returns "Y", otherwise it returns "N".

columns.name: INJECTION_YN
columns.description: Y if the patient uses an injection as a form of birth control. N if the patient does not. NOTE: Uses the EPIC_IN_ITEM function to determine if a given value exists in a multiple response item.  If the category value for this selection exists in the multiple response item, then it returns "Y", otherwise it returns "N".

columns.name: SPONGE_YN
columns.description: Y if the patient uses a sponge as a form of birth control. N if the patient does not. NOTE: Uses the EPIC_IN_ITEM function to determine if a given value exists in a multiple response item.  If the category value for this selection exists in the multiple response item, then it returns "Y", otherwise it returns "N".

columns.name: INSERTS_YN
columns.description: Y if the patient uses inserts as a form of birth control. N if the patient does not. NOTE: Uses the EPIC_IN_ITEM function to determine if a given value exists in a multiple response item.  If the category value for this selection exists in the multiple response item, then it returns "Y", otherwise it returns "N".

columns.name: ABSTINENCE_YN
columns.description: Y if the patient practices abstinence. N if the patient does not. NOTE: Uses the EPIC_IN_ITEM function to determine if a given value exists in a multiple response item.  If the category value for this selection exists in the multiple response item, then it returns "Y", otherwise it returns "N".

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: TOB_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description: Source for Tobacco History

columns.name: ALCOHOL_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description: This columns stores the person (e.g. provider, patient, legal guardian) who provided alcohol use information for this encounter.

columns.name: DRUG_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description: This columns stores the person (e.g. provider, patient, legal guardian) who provided illicit drug use information for this encounter.

columns.name: SEX_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description: This columns stores the person (e.g. provider, patient, legal guardian) who provided sexual activity information for this encounter.

columns.name: HX_LNK_ENC_CSN
columns.description: The Contact Serial Number of the encounter in which the history was created/edited. If the history was created/edited outside of the context of an encounter, then this column will be blank.

columns.name: ALCOHOL_USE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value associated with the patient's alcohol use. Data may include, Yes, No, or Not Asked.

columns.name: ILL_DRUG_USER_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value associated with the patient's use of illicit drugs. Data may include, Yes, No, or Not Asked.

columns.name: SEXUALLY_ACTIVE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value associated with the patient's sexual activity. Data may include Yes, No, Not Asked, or Not Now

columns.name: TOBACCO_USER_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value associated with the patient's tobacco use. Data may include, Yes, Never, Not Asked or Quit.

columns.name: SMOKELESS_TOB_USE_C
columns.description: Stores the patient's usage of smokeless tobacco.  Data may include, Current User, Former User, Never Used or Unknown.

columns.name: SMOKING_TOB_USE_C
columns.description: Stores the patient's usage of smoking tobacco.  Data may include, Current Everyday Smoker, Current Some Day Smoker, Former Smoker, Never Smoker, Unknown If Ever Smoked or Smoker, Current Status Unknown.

columns.name: UNKNOWN_FAM_HX_YN
columns.description: Y if the patient's family history is unknown by the patient. N otherwise.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

merged.name: FAM_HX_PAT_ONLY
merged.description: This table represents all family history specific patient information.
